extraction.extract.extract_information_from_pdf(chemin_du_pdf)[source]¶

Extracts information from a PDF document using OpenAI’s GPT-3.5-turbo model.

Parameters:

chemin_du_pdf (str) – The path to the PDF file.

Returns:

An instance of the Article model containing extracted information.

Return type:

Article
